overview:
Avery Fisher is the Chief Executive Officer of Nashville, Tennessee-based Primocare, a health care services company dedicated to helping physicians help patients.

Avery started his career a decade ago as a creative at an ad agency. His success managing client engagements catapulted him to a leadership role at a new firm, where he was responsible for one of the most popular websites on the internet at the time, allmusic. Following a successful relaunch and monetization of allmusic, Avery founded ACFisher, a digital marketing consultancy serving Fortune 500 companies.

Avery graduated with an MBA from Vanderbilt University’s Owen Graduate School of Management and a BBA magna cum laude from Eastern Michigan University’s Owen College of Business. He is a recipient of the Financial Executives International’s Award of Academic Excellence, awarded to the top finance student in a University’s graduating class, and a member of Beta Gamma Sigma, the business honors fraternity.
